The Save 418 Movement

We are all a teapot.

Error Code 418 states that

Any attempt to brew coffee with a teapot should result in the error code "418 I'm a teapot". The resulting entity body MAY be short and stout.

See RFC2324 Section 2.3.2
The application of such an error code is boundless. Its utility, quite simply, is astonishingly unparalleled. so I implore you to help thwart this conniving Github contributor Express your concerns regarding the ramifications of removing such a practical error code from Node.js. Before its too late. #save418
